A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you want to defy expectations and do something new that's great but don't forget you still have to earn it. It looked beautiful but storywise it was all lazy\, cheap\, or stupid. Every character in it is staggeringly incompetent. They managed to make the longest star wars yet and make it feel like a bad filler episode from the clone wars. In short wasted potential.
